contentText.text: After Jian refused the cash a second time, Eduardo suggests that instead he can take Jian and some of Eduardo’s team members to dinner at a local restaurant.
The restaurant is relatively modest, so Jian accepts. He tells his manager about the invitation, and his manager agrees that it is appropriate to go.
A few days later, Jian joins the supplier and his team at the restaurant – and after dinner, the supplier makes an unexpected offer.

revelCollOut.text: Let’s keep the fun going! I know a late night spot around here. It’s close enough to walk. Come on, what do you say? First drinks are on me.

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.
